data.title: 20 Tons Of Nutella Stolen From Truck In Germany - Police are looking out for over $80,000 of sweet contraband. “Anyone offered large quantities of chocolate via unconventional channels should report it to the police immediately.”

Chinese Ship Found Carrying Endangered Species from Galapagos - It was carrying 300 metric tons of frozen marine species, with endangered fish & hammerhead sharks piled down below. The area forms the largest biomass of sharks in existence.

Pussy Riot's Nadya Tolokonnikova - Authoritarianism is spreading like 'sexually transmitted diseases': Tolokonnikova, who was imprisoned for protesting Russian President Vladimir Putin, says "democracy is being eroded" by leaders like President Donald Trump.
